title: Can a woman pray Taraweeh at home? - Sheikh Assimalhakeem
transcript: his third question was or ears can a woman pray taraweeh at home the prayer is a little bit awkward it should be reversed can a woman pray taraweeh at the Masjid because the default and the norm is that a woman prays taraweeh in her home this is more rewarding and this is the more following the Sunnah and this is what the prophet has instructed her
